name: Chih-Hao Luke Ong
content: Luke Ong | Department of Computer Science Skip to main content University of Oxford Department of Computer Science HomeAbout UsPeopleFacultyLuke OngLuke Ong Professor Luke Ong Professor of Computer ScienceLeaving date: 28th February 2024Themes:Programming LanguagesQuantumAutomated VerificationCompleted Projects:Pushdown Automata and Game Semanticsmore…See Also:Home pageInterestsMy research has mainly been in Semantics of Computation, which is concerned with the development and analysis of mathematical structures that model computation using ideas and tools from Mathematical Logic. More recently my research has tended to be motivated by problems of an algorithmic nature.
